name: creating new product and verify it is added
id: testing-different-request-on-bestbuy-products:creating new product and verify it is added

testSteps.description: When I create a new product by providing information "<name>" "<type>""<model>" "<description>" "<url>" "<image>" "<manufacture>" "<UPC>"
